Description: A hostile combatant wielding a Photon Laser.

Encounter.Intro: While exploring E.I.'s Training Room you can help but be amazed! You come across a control panel and decide to give the training program a shot. You press the button and out comes this strange robot riding on one wheel and as a monitor for a face. Im Yes Man, Dr. Evil's favorite robot! That's why he keeps me down here to show me his love!!!! Now [b]I"LL SHOW YOU MINE!!!!![/b] Hey what the fuck is this? You ask aloud. The robot looks at you with his creepy smile and points his arms at you and fires lasers around you. [c Red][b]Lets Fight![/b][/c]
Encounter.EnemyMiss: [middle]Yes Man flailed all over but you managed to avoid being hit![/middle]
Encounter.EnemyHit: [middle]Im not done yet! The strange robot yells. [b][c Red]PEW! PEW! PEW![/c][/b] The robot looks at you with his creepy smile and points his arms at you and fires lasers at you for [b][c 0,128,64][v: _enemyDMG] [/c]Damage[/b][/middle]
Encounter.EnemyCritical: [middle]Focusing both of his laser on you Yes Man's screen turns to the image of a skull and crossbones. His arms blast you with a strong laser beam and one comes down from the ceiling that knocks you down. [c Red][b]CRITICAL HIT![/b][/c][/middle][middle]You take [c Red][b][v: _enemyDMG] damage[/b][/c][/middle]
Encounter.Victory: [middle]You defeated Yes Man. After about 10 seconds he seems to reboot and hops back up as if nothing happens. Good Show Sir![/middle]

PassCommands.CommandText: Yes Man raises his Photon Laser.
